text: Edakkidom is a village in Kollam district in the Indian state of Kerala, located about north of Kollam city. The main attraction is Thettikkunnil Mahadevi Temple. ==Distance from nearest known places== * Kottarakkara : 8.1 KM * Paravur : 23.3 KM * Ezhukone :3 KM * Kundara : 8.4 KM * Chathannoor : 14.8KM * Odanavattom : 7.2 KM * Nedumankavu:5.8 KM * Ambalathumkala South Bus Stop, NH744, 3.3 km * Ayoor:21.3 KM * kollam Railway Station, Chamkkada, 22.3 KM ==Demographics== This village has a majority population of the Hindus (Mainly Nairs and Ezhavas). ==Economy== This village is mainly dependent on agricultural products which includes rubber, black pepper, cashewnut, rice Plantain etc. Some of the famous nearby places are Kollam, Kottarakkara, Ezhukone, Odanavattom, Punalur etc. ==Industries== Kareepra Cooperative Bank, Edakkidom & SupplyCo Maveli Store at KSN Building, Sodiac Tiles (BK Agencies), SLS wood industries, Mother rubber manufacturers. Rajan cashews, Ambalakara cashwes factory,11 KV Substation (KSEB) AM Junction Edakkidom North,S.R. Agencies ==Educational institutions== There is one primary school at Edakkidom, Govt L.P.School Edakkidom, and one aided SANSKRIT secondary school SNGSHS Kadaikode, Edaikkidom , KNS memorial S N Central school (CBSE), St George vocational higher secondary school at Chowalloor, Edakkidom. Sree Sankara Sanskrit vidyapeetam (BA, MA in Sanskrits), S.S.V.U.P.S Edakkidom.Akshya computer education centre,SRI SRI ACADEMY EZHUKONE-Edakkidom 691505 ==Temples== * Edakkidom Thettikkunil Sree Maha Devi Devaswam * Munnur Indilayappan Temple * Valayikkodu Karthikeyapuram Temple * Gurunadan Mukal Temple * Malanada Temple * Mannoor Thevar vishnu temple * Thevarpoyika Mahavishnu Temple Edakkidom. * Nalannil Sree Nagaraja Kshethram,Valayikkodu,Edakkidom ==Tourism== The Kerala backwaters of Kollam/Alappuzha is 14 km from Edakkidom. Some of the tourist spots near Edakkidom are Thenmala Ecotourism (39 km) and Palaruvi Water Falls (33 km). Edakkidom is a part of assembly constituency Kottarakara and Lok Sabha constituency Mavelikkara. INC, CPI(M) is the major working political party in Edakkidom. Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Edakkidom
